subject: Basketball
College Athletics
lead_paragraph: Jack McClinton scored all of his 20 points in the game’s first 26 ½ minutes and James Dews had 7 of his 9 points in a 9-0 second-half run as Miami beat St. John’s, 70-56.
snippet: Jack McClinton scored all of his 20 points in the game’s first 26 ½ minutes and James Dews had 7 of his 9 points in a 9-0 second-half run as Miami beat St. John’s, 70-56.
